game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the lost temple.
game.description: The temple has been hidden for centuries, and many have attempted to retrieve its treasures. Your mission is to find the entrance, navigate through the traps, and retrieve the artifact.
game.reward: 100 gold pieces and a magical amulet

tasks.objective: Find the entrance to the temple
tasks.description: Search the surrounding area for any clues or markings that may lead you to the temple.

tasks.objective: Navigate through the traps inside the temple
tasks.description: Be cautious of falling rocks, spinning blades, and other deadly traps as you make your way deeper into the temple.
Once inside the innermost sanctum, retrieve the artifact and prepare to escape.
tasks.location: The innermost sanctum of the lost temple
